quest.name: Give Them the Evil Eye
journal: Mawt is whispering to herself in sinister tones.
objectives: Place the fresh vegetables at the designated location.
Wait for an Abalathian catoblepas to appear, then use the paralytic powder on the creature and slay it for its eye.
Deliver the catoblepas eye to Mawt.

dialogue.name: MAWT
dialogue.text: Do you know what a catoblepas is? You don't see them around much these days, but I spotted one that strayed from its herd.

dialogue.name: MAWT
dialogue.text: The eye of such a creature is said to possess baneful powers. I want it. I need it! Now, I'm just a delicate lass, but I'll wager you'd have no trouble popping it free from that wandering monster's skull.

dialogue.name: MAWT
dialogue.text: Here, I have it all planned out: bait this spot over to the west with these vegetables, and wait for the catoblepas to toddle over and take a nibble. Then you fling this paralytic powder in its face!

dialogue.name: MAWT
dialogue.text: That should slow it down enough to let you strike a clean killing blow─I don't want any harm to come to that precious eye. Right, then! I'll be waiting!

dialogue.name: MAWT
dialogue.text: Was the plan not clear? Bait the spot with the vegetables, numb the catoblepas with the powder, then ease that wondrously evil eye from its socket!

dialogue.name: MAWT
dialogue.text: I get a talisman of accursed power, and you get a pick from my hoarded goods. We both win!

dialogue.name: MAWT
dialogue.text:
Evil eye, evil eye, how I wish that you were mine...
Well? Did you get it? Is it unblemished?

dialogue.name: MAWT
dialogue.text: Yes! It's perfect! Ah, just gazing into this foreboding orb sends a chill through my soul!

dialogue.name: MAWT
dialogue.text: As my dear, departed nana used to say, “If you want the nastiest curse, use the eye of a catoblepas!”

dialogue.name: MAWT
dialogue.text: Ahahaha. Mwahaha! Gyahahahahaha! My revenge is nigh, you imperial bastards! May the fleas of a thousand jhammels infest your nethers!
